<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ki Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=433) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 158 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your study of the flow of mystical energy allows you to harness it into your physical strikes. You gain the [_ki strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=486) ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. The rules for ki spells are summarized in the [Key Terms section on the monk class page](/Classes.aspx?ID=8), and the full rules for focus spells appear [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=276).

<title level="2">Ki Strike leads to...</title>
[Elemental Fist](/Feats.aspx?ID=441), [Sacred Ki](/Feats.aspx?ID=1184)
name: Ki Strike
